item.title: Sharing wifi with a raspberry pi zero w using create_ap
item.description: I had a bit of a chicken and egg situation while connecting a raspberry pi zero w to wifi. I work on a ship for six weeks at a time, so my choice of wifi is limited to the cabin network on the ship. This has a two part authentication. First, a password is used to connect to the wifi. Then a user ID and a different password is entered into a login page on a browser.
